PageWidgetPortable.Title: Aguardando gerar OS
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>AGA_MF_PLANOPREVENTIVO.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.ROTEIROMANUTENCAO IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM MA_ROTEIROMANUTENCAO WHERE UTILIZARPLANOLUBRIFICACAO = 'S') AND A.ORDEMSERVICO IS NULL AND (A.CONJUNTOMANUTENCAO = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t4637_at7018_hsbce06bfb.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Com OS gerada
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>AGA_MF_PLANOPREVENTIVO.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.ROTEIROMANUTENCAO IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM MA_ROTEIROMANUTENCAO WHERE UTILIZARPLANOLUBRIFICACAO = 'S') AND (A.ORDEMSERVICO IS NOT NULL) AND (A.ORDEMSERVICO NOT IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM MF_ORDEMSERVICOS WHERE STATUS = 3)) AND (A.CONJUNTOMANUTENCAO = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t4637_at7019_hs3be1130a.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
